name: Sticky Box (Isaac Games)
description:
Squish the blue block with an orange block to win.

Sticky Box is a tiny puzzle game made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together", so I made a sliding block puzzle where you control one block and can make it stick to neighbor blocks to drag them around.

There's only a few levels because I had very little time, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless.
